page.title: 09GRAFFITI IN THE LAINDON AREA
page.content: The walls of{Laindon and Basildon}have recently been "decorated" by{graffiti gangs. Young people aged between 13 to 20 have been using the subway walls for their{"burners."}A burner is a graffiti competition. The graffiti artists say they want to brighten up the area and some of their work dows look attractive. However many members of the public think the walls should be left whitewashed. They say the graffiti is an eyesore. Some children in our school think that the graffiti is so artistic that it should be allowed to remain. It is a change from all the dirty things that usually get written on walls. Others think that there should be special places for graffiti writing and drawings.
